### disableErrorFlat?

```ts
optional disableErrorFlat: boolean;
```

Defined in: [tanstack-field.directive.ts:95](https://github.com/TanStack/form/blob/main/packages/angular-form/src/tanstack-field.directive.ts#L95)

Disable the `flat(1)` operation on `field.errors`. This is useful if you want to keep the error structure as is. Not suggested for most use-cases.

FieldOptions.disableErrorFlat

### name

The field name. The type will be `DeepKeys<TParentData>` to ensure your name is a deep key of the parent dataset.

### ngOnChanges()

```ts
ngOnChanges(): void
```

Defined in: [tanstack-field.directive.ts:163](https://github.com/TanStack/form/blob/main/packages/angular-form/src/tanstack-field.directive.ts#L163)

A callback method that is invoked immediately after the
default change detector has checked data-bound properties
if at least one has changed, and before the view and content
children are checked.

#### Returns

`void`

### ngOnInit()

```ts
ngOnInit(): void
```

Defined in: [tanstack-field.directive.ts:153](https://github.com/TanStack/form/blob/main/packages/angular-form/src/tanstack-field.directive.ts#L153)

A callback method that is invoked immediately after the
default change detector has checked the directive's
data-bound properties for the first time,
and before any of the view or content children have been checked.
It is invoked only once when the directive is instantiated.

#### Returns

`void`

#### Implementation of

```ts
OnInit.ngOnInit
```
